title: Password reset not working
body: Ive changed my password multiple times on the lol browser but when i go to login it doesnt accept my password change. ive reloaded the client and ive also done everything email wise does anyone have any tips?

replies.body: I can see all of the password resets being done recently, so it's a little strange that they haven't seemed to work so far. Make sure your client is set to the NA if you're trying to login to this account, and double check that the username is correct as well.
Thank you, this fixed my problem!!!
